creator_2: The Academy of Beauty Culture, Ltd ?
physical_appearance: This is a diploma certificate issued and endorsed by The Academy of Beauty Culture Ltd certifying that Florence Chong Chit Moy is qualified to practise short wave epilation. The certificate it framed in a black frame.
sgcool_label_text: This diploma was awarded to Mrs Florence Chong (nee Wong Chit Moy) on 14 September 1954 by the Academy of Beauty Culture Ltd at New Bond Street, London. Mrs Florence Chong was the seventh sister of prominent local bridal designer Mrs Sylvia Kho (nee Wong Sien Moy). She received training in make-up and hairstyling in London and provided her services to brides in Singapore as early as the 1950s.
title_text: Diploma certificate from the Academy of Beauty Culture, London
subject_terms_2: Diplomas  Hair Removal Beauty schools  Education  Certification
